songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
I love you
More than you could ever know
I love you
Even when the snow is falling

[Verse 1]
But how did you know?
You swept my heart
Said those words
You cradled me
Exactly the way I
Needed to feel good

[Chorus]
Your love, your love
Your love, your love
Your love, your love
Love

[Verse 2]
I'm touching your face
No need to cry
You're hearing my heart and
You're risking your life
Is love is deep?
I can see in the sky
Cause we're floating together
We're going so high

[Verse 3]
Too bad we don't ever see each other
It's too bad
My emotions change like the weather
And I'm sad
I just wish that I had time for
The plastic morals that I've never had
They're gone now
They're gone now
They're gone now
songs.title: Your Love
